trans-unit.target: Devolve os dados a partir de <xref href="System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: É criada uma instância do BookmarkReachedEventArgs quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>objeto gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>eventos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>gera o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>eventos quando encontra um marcador durante o processamento de qualquer um do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, ou <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o nome e localização do marcador que acionou o evento, aceda a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>Propriedades no processador para o evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o desvio em que foi atingido o marcador do tempo.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Devolve a localização no fluxo de entrada de áudio de um motor de synthesis quando o evento foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do marcador que foi atingido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor para o nome do marcador.
